name: Slow Cooker Mongolian Beef
author: leith123
summary: I got this recipe from a friend and it is wonderful.  My kids love it.  It tastes like you got it at a Chinese restaurant and the slow cooker does most of the work! Serve over steamed rice.
ingredients: 1 pound flank steak, cut into bite-size pieces
3 large green onions, sliced diagonally into 1/2 inch pieces
½ teaspoon minced fresh ginger root
directions: Place flank steak and cornstarch into a resealable plastic bag
Shake the bag to evenly coat the flank steak with the cornstarch
Allow to steak rest for 10 minutes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir steak until evenly browned, 2 to 4 minutes
Place onion, garlic, flank steak, green onions, soy sauce, water, brown sugar, ginger, and hoisin sauce in a slow cooker
Cook on Low setting for about 4 hours
